title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
**Advertising Description:**

Bring the magic of Christmas into your gatherings with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. Each napkin in this beautiful set features a stunning nativity scene design, embodying the religious significance and festive spirit of the holiday season.

Made from premium polyester material, these smooth and glossy napkins not only add elegance to your table but are also washable and reusable for multiple uses. The set comes in a captivating blue color with gold embroidered texts that read 'Joy', 'Love', 'Blessed', 'Merry', 'Believe', and 'Peace'.

This thoughtful set of 12 embroidered Christmas cloth napkins is perfect for any Christmas gathering, meal, or religious occasion. Gift these elegant napkins to your family, friends, or fellow believers as a symbol of love, joy, and the true meaning of Christmas. With a size of 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm), each napkin provides ample space for comfortable use.

Please note that slight errors may occur in size due to manual measurement and possible slight differences in color display on screens. These variations do not affect the quality or functionality of the product.
